snippet: Laura Hercher of Sarah Lawrence College writes that “treating people differently based on what genes they have is a bad use of science.”
lead_paragraph: Laura Hercher of Sarah Lawrence College writes that “treating people differently based on what genes they have is a bad use of science.”

headline.main: Help Children Based on Genes? ‘A Bad Use of Science’
headline.print_headline: Help Children Based on Genes? ‘A Bad Use of Science’
